metadata.title: CVE-2018-0504 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1, 1.30.1, 1.29.3 and 1.27.5 contains aninformation disclosure flaw in the Special:Redirect/logid

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
